articles.title: Covid Vaccine Has Good Immune Response With Two-Dose Regime, Says Oxford - NDTV
articles.description: Oxford's COVID-19 vaccine candidate has a better immune response when a two full-dose regime is used rather than a full-dose followed by a half-dose booster, the university said on Thursday.
articles.content:
The university said it had explored two dosing regimes in early stage trials.

articles.title: WhatsApp to Start Offering Health Insurance, Micro-Pension Products in India Soon - Gadgets 360

articles.description: Markets today: Heavyweights like HDFC, Bajaj Finance, HDFC Bank, and Reliance ended between 0.5 per cent and 3 per cent higher on the S&P BSE Sensex
